text: Aasmaano aur zameen ka banane waala, jisne tumhari apni jins se tumhare liye jodey (pairs) paida kiye, aur isi tarah jaanwaron mein bhi (unhi ke hum jins) jodey(pairs) banaye, aur is tareeqe se woh tumhari naslein (generations) phailata hai. Qayanat ki koi cheez uske mushabeh nahin, woh sab kuch sunnay aur dekhne wala hai
